_meanings:
{@--2@} Going by leaps, 
traversing, passing over, going, 
motion in general; {#yUyameva paTi#} 
{#SIGralaMGanAH#} <ls>Ghaṭ. 8.</ls>

{@--5@} Exceeding, going
beyond, overstepping violating,
transgression; {#AjYAlaMGanaM, niyamalaMGanaM#}
&c.

{@--8@} A harm, an injury; as in  
{#AtapalaMGanaM#} <ab>q. v.</ab>

{@--10@} One of the paces
of a horse.
